const [signer] = await ethers.getSigners();const reg = await ethers.getContractAt("IssuerRegistry", "0x9fE46736679d2D9a65F0992F2272dE9f3c7fa6e0");await reg.connect(signer).registerIssuer("Test", "Org", "a@b.com");
const reg = await ethers.getContractAt("IssuerRegistry", "0x9fE46736679d2D9a65F0992F2272dE9f3c7fa6e0");await reg.getIssuer("0xf39Fd6e51aad88F6F4ce6aB8827279cffFb92266");
await reg.getIssuer("0xf39Fd6e51aad88F6F4ce6aB
const reg = await ethers.getContractAt("IssuerRegistry", "0x9fE46736679d2D9a65F0992F2272dE9f3c7fa6e0");
